operations.target_text: Guest Network Access: Visitors to the Company can access guest networks by registering with the office personnel, bypassing the need for a formal access request.
operations.comment: You indicated that you have an office, so guest network access section should be maintained. Having an office means visitors need controlled network access for security.
You indicated you use GitLab for version control, so this section should be maintained. Using version control means IP protection is needed.

operations.target_text: Password management systems should be user-friendly
operations.replacement: Password management systems, specifically LastPass, should be user-friendly
operations.comment: You indicated you use LastPass for password management, so the policy should reference the actual system rather than using generic language.

operations.target_text: All requests will be sent by email to <email>
operations.replacement: All requests will be submitted through Zendesk ticketing system
operations.comment: You indicated you use Zendesk for ticket management and prefer using a ticketing system for access requests. Ticketing systems provide proper audit trails compared to email-based requests.

You selected semi-annual reviews instead of quarterly basis. For a small company of 2 employees, semi-annual reviews are appropriate. We recommend quarterly reviews for most companies, but small companies can use longer intervals.

You selected immediate access termination. For a small company of 2 employees, immediate termination is feasible and provides the best security. Larger organizations often need more time to process terminations.
You indicated that Hassan Tayyab is the owner of this access control policy. This person will be responsible for enforcing the policy and answering any questions from employees.
You indicated that the Security Team is responsible for approving exceptions to this policy. This role is appropriate and clearly defines accountability for policy exceptions.
You indicated that the Security Team is responsible for handling policy violations. This maintains consistency with the exceptions approval authority.
